name: drawing-by-hand
description: 基于MediaPipe的手部追踪画图应用

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-files && npm run minify
scripts.copy-files: mkdir -p dist && cp -r public dist/ && cp server.js dist/ && cp package.json dist/ && cp public/index-static.html dist/public/index.html
scripts.minify: npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
scripts.serve-dist: cd dist && npm install --production && node server.js
